headline: Recent Attacks in France Point to a Threat Beyond Extremist Networks
text: PARIS — All were unknown to police intelligence officials. None pledged allegiance to a terrorist group, and no group claimed them as members. None stated any political agenda. Signs of radicalization, if at all visible, were expressed on social media. And they came armed with little more than knives.
snippet: The most recent attackers were isolated, self-radicalized individuals. That has raised questions about the government’s response.
